arStrings.szText:
Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill costs {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life instead of Primary Resource. Will only occur if you have at least {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]%{/c} of your Maximum Life.

Skills that consume Life deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|+%|]{/c} increased damage.
